data.title: Salary, Income, Net Worth: Michael Dell
data.meta_description: Check salary, income and/or net worth of Michael Dell at Paywizard.org
data.text:
Fictional income calculated by subtracting the net worth of 2023 from the 2024 net worth.

Net Worth 2024: $98.7 Billion (no rise compared to last year)

Forbes Apr 2022: Fictional income calculated by subtracting the net worth of 2021 from the 2022 net worth:

Net worth Apr 2022 $50 B

Net worth Apr 2021 $45.1B

Forbes Apr. 2021: Fictional income calculated by subtracting the networth of 2020 from the 2021 networth:

Networth Apr. 2020: $22.9B

Networth Apr. 2021: $45.1B

Crn.com Nov 2019: Michael Dell, chairman, CEO, Founder: Total Compensation: $3,623,801
